title: 820-01521 Water Damage No Display
message:
So i've got an 820-01521 in today from a Macbook Air which was water damaged. Fixed the short on ppbus which was preventing it from turning on, it switches on now and works on external display but nothing on the internal screen. The LCD connector is clean and no sign of liquid there however Pin 3 DP_INT_AUXCH_C_P on J8500 is reading 8ohms to ground in resistance mode and 0.0002 in diode mode. Getting the same readings if I pull R8502. Pin 2 reads normal 0.290 in diode mode. 

Just wanted to check because I think this means cpu itself is internally broken and is not fixable?

title: 820-01521 Water Damage No Display
message: Dead CPU, directly connected to J8500...

title: 820-01521 Water Damage No Display
message: Thought so thanks - they'll just have to use it on external monitor only then!
